This is a simple blog post demonstrating the Catppuccin Mocha theme. The blog focuses on clean design, emphasizing content with minimal distractions.

The Catppuccin theme is a warm, dark color palette that provides a comfortable reading experience, especially during long sessions. Here's why I chose it:

  • It's easy on the eyes with warm tones.
  • It works well in low-light environments.
  • It has a nice contrast without being too harsh.
